info.name: Smart Taskhub API
info.description: API documentation for Smart Taskhub, a task and project management application.

request.description: Creates a new user account
Authenticates user and returns JWT token

response.name: Invalid data

request.description: Logs out the current user and invalidates the session
Returns information about the currently authenticated user
Refreshes the current authentication token
Verifies if the user is currently authenticated
Retrieves the role of the current user
Retrieves all workspaces for the authenticated user

response.name: Workspaces retrieved successfully

request.description: Creates a new workspace for the authenticated user

response.name: Invalid request data

request.description: Retrieves a specific workspace by its ID

response.name: Workspace retrieved successfully

request.description: Updates an existing workspace

response.name: Invalid request data

request.description: Deletes a workspace

response.name: Workspace not found or could not be deleted

request.description: Creates a new project in the specified workspace

response.name: Invalid request data

request.description: Retrieves all projects in the specified workspace for the authenticated user
Marks a project as completed

response.name: Project not found

request.description: Marks a project as deleted

response.name: Project not found

request.description: Reopens a previously completed or deleted project

response.name: Invalid data
Project not found

request.description: Retrieves all completed projects for the authenticated user

response.name: Completed projects retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves preview information for a given URL

response.name: Invalid URL or missing URL parameter

request.description: Handles CORS preflight requests for URL preview endpoint
Creates a new column in the specified project

response.name: Invalid request data
Project not found

request.description: Retrieves all columns in the specified project along with their tasks

response.name: Columns retrieved successfully
Project not found

request.description: Updates the details of a specific column in a project

response.name: Project or column not found

request.description: Archives a specific column in a project
Restores a previously archived column in a project
Deletes a specific column in a project
Creates a new task in the specified column

response.name: User is not a member of the project or project is not active
Column not found
Task name already exists

request.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific task

response.name: Task details retrieved successfully
response.body:
{
  "message": "Task retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Implement authentication",
    "description": "This task involves implementing user authentication",
    "startDate": "2023-12-31T23:59:59Z",
    "endDate": "2024-01-15T23:59:59Z",
    "priority": "HIGH",
    "status": "active",
    "position": 1,
    "columnId": 1,
    "isCompleted": false,
    "createdAt": "2023-10-01T12:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-10-05T15:30:00Z"
  }
}
